full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Live Fire Training Aircraft Prop for ARFF Operations Training and Recertification**

## Background
The Royal Canadian Air Force (RCAF) is seeking a contractor to supply, install, and commission a live fire training aircraft prop for the ARFF (Aerial Refueling and Firefighting) operations training and recertification program.

## Notice Type and Contracting Entity
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND).

## Tender Details

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Tender Reference** | WS3796299342 |
| **Amendment Number** | 4 |
| **Solicitation Number** | WS3796299342 |
| **Publication Date** | January 12, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | March 8, 2023, 14:00 Eastern Time |
| **Amendment Date** | March 1, 2023 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | To be determined |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | To be determined |
| **Tender Status** | Expiré (Expired) |

## Procurement Details

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Trade Agreements** | Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others |
| **Regions of Opportunity** | None |
| **Regions of Delivery** | New Brunswick |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open bidding |
| **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Price |

## Additional Information

* The contractor must provide a Class B fueled ARFF training system, installation, and commissioning services.
* The proposed solution must be capable of simulating a live fire training aircraft.
* The deliverables will be installed at the Fire Department’s current training area at 5 CDSB Gagetown, NB.

## Contact Information
To obtain more information about this tender, please contact:

* Lacey, Rhonda (SPAC/PSPC)
* rhonda.lacey@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15112653?extsite=MTUxMTI2NTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
